medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has been experiencing progressive cognitive decline, inappropriate behavior, memory loss, and increased gait difficulty over the last month. He fell while walking to choir rehearsal, without loss of consciousness or hitting his head. He also had subjective fever, cough, shortness of breath, rhinorrhea, and sore throat for the last two days.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with dementia; son with bipolar disorder.
